articles.title: PBA targets late June to begin Season 46 - CNN Philippines
articles.description: PBA Commissioner Willie Marcial says the league plans to open the 46th season by 'late June or early July' after the FIBA Asia Cup qualifiers in Pampanga.
articles.content:
